com.dusten.paint.components

Class DrawableCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
        • com.dusten.paint.components.DrawableCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class DrawableCanvas
extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
    Author:
    Dusten Knull Component class based on the JavaFX Canvas component with specific rules and events made to be useful specifically for Paint-MVC

      • undoEdit

        public void undoEdit()
        "Un-does" the most recent edit by moving the edit history index back one, if applicable (DOES NOT remove the PaintOperator from the edit history list)
